data.message: Facebook, my name was changed and I’m not able to change it back. Can you please help?!

replies.message: You shouldn't use your real name on here anyways, just make it look like a real name. Nobody should have this information not even Facebook and their thieves and liars that work for them should have it maybe leave megan but the last name make it up it's dangerous now days to leave anything real on facebook as long as your friends know it's you nobody else needs to know
Hi Megan. You can learn to change your name in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2BipKyv. -Tenaya
